column3: $1. Simmer potatoes in medium saucepan and cook over medium heat until tender
column4: about 20 minutes $2. Drain and let potatoes sit $3. Combine milk and salt in pan
column5: heat milk and mash potatoes into milk $4. Separately
column6: melt butter and cook over low heat until solids are golden brown $5. Add half of the butter to the potatoes
column7: and serve topped with the rest.
